trans-unit.source: Implements <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> and provides the base implementation for remotable components that are marshaled by value (a copy of the serialized object is passed).
trans-unit.target: Implementa <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> e fornece a implementação base dos componentes de remota que são empacotar as referências ao valor (uma cópia do objecto serializado é transmitida).

trans-unit.source: A component can be contained in a container.
trans-unit.target: Um componente pode ser contido num contentor.

trans-unit.source: For each component in a container, the container creates a site that it uses to manage the component.
trans-unit.target: Para cada componente num contentor, o contentor cria um site que utiliza para gerir o componente.

trans-unit.source: The component interacts with its container primarily through a container-provided <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>, which is a repository of container-specific, per-component information.
trans-unit.target: O componente interage com o respectivo contentor principalmente através de um contentor fornecido <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>, que é um repositório de informações específicas do contentor, por componente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A component can be contained in a container.
trans-unit.target: Um componente pode ser contido num contentor.

trans-unit.source: For each component in a container, the container creates a site that it uses to manage the component.
trans-unit.target: Para cada componente num contentor, o contentor cria um site que utiliza para gerir o componente.

trans-unit.source: The component interacts with its container primarily through a container-provided <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>, which is a repository of container-specific, per-component information.
trans-unit.target: O componente interage com o respectivo contentor principalmente através de um contentor fornecido <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>, que é um repositório de informações específicas do contentor, por componente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>

trans-unit.source: Gets the container for the component.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o contentor para o componente.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> interface that represents the component's container, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the component does not have a site.
trans-unit.target: Implementar um objeto de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref> interface que representa o contentor do componente, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o componente não tiver um site.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the component is currently in design mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o componente está atualmente no modo de estrutura.

trans-unit.source: If the component does not have a site, this method always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se o componente não tem um site, este método sempre devolve `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the component is in design mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o componente está no modo de estrutura; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Versões de todos os recursos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent>.
trans-unit.target: É possível chamar Dispose quando tiver terminado de utilizando <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O método de Dispose deixa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent>num Estado não utilizável.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar Dispose, tem de libertar todas as referências para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent>para que o recoletor de lixo pode reclame a memória que a <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent>foi occupying.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementar um método eliminar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada eliminar antes de libertar a última referência <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está a utilizar não irão ser libertados até que as chamadas de recoletor de lixo a <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent>do objeto `Finalize` método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent"> </xref> e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado pelo público `Dispose()`método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`invoca protegida `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método versões retidos por quaisquer objetos geridos de todos os recursos que este <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent>referências.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o `Dispose()` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Adds an event handler to listen to the Disposed event on the component.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um processador de eventos para escutar eventos eliminado no componente.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of event handlers that are attached to this component.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a lista de processadores de eventos que estão anexados a este componente.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList"></xref> that provides the delegates for this component.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList"> </xref> que fornece os delegados para este componente.

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Permite que um objeto para tentar libertar recursos e efetuar outras operações de limpeza antes de que reclamada a através da recolha de lixo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the implementer of the <xref:System.IServiceProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o implementador de <xref:System.IServiceProvider>.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: For more information on designer services you can use, see [Design-Time Architecture](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre serviços estruturador, pode utilizar, consulte [arquitetura do momento da conceção](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of service you want.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>que representa o tipo de serviço que quiser.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the implementer of the <xref:System.IServiceProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o implementador de <xref:System.IServiceProvider>.</xref:System.IServiceProvider> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the site of the component.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o site do componente.

trans-unit.source: A valid value for this property - that is, the value is not `null`, indicates that the component has been added to a container.
trans-unit.target: Um valor válido para esta propriedade - ou seja, o valor não é `null`, indica que o componente foi adicionado a um contentor.

trans-unit.source: When the value of this property is `null`, the property indicates that the component is being removed from a container.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor desta propriedade é `null`, a propriedade indica que o componente está a ser removido a partir de um contentor.

trans-unit.source: However, this property does not remove the component from the container.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, esta propriedade não remove o componente do contentor.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"></xref> interface that represents the site of the component.
trans-unit.target: Implementar um objeto de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"> </xref> interface que representa o site do componente.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> containing the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref:System.String>contendo o nome do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, se aplicável.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This method should not be overridden.
trans-unit.target: Este método não deve ser substituído.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> may or may not have a name.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>pode ou não ter um nome.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> is given a name, the name is unique among other <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> objects within its <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>é fornecido um nome, o nome é exclusivo, entre outros <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>objetos dentro do respetivo <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> stores the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>'s name.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>armazena o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>do nome.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> can only have a <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> if it has been added to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> assigns an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> to it.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>só pode ter um <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>se foi adicionado um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>atribui um <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>ao mesmo.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>contendo o nome do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, se aplicável.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is unnamed.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> é sem nome.
